summary: An email from an FBI forensic accountant in the New York Field Office providing Suspicious Activity Reports (SARs) filed on Ghislaine Maxwell, along with attached spreadsheets from UBS and JPMC banks. The document shows ongoing financial investigation into Maxwell's activities.

persons.name: Maxwell
persons.context: Ghislaine Maxwell is the subject of Suspicious Activity Reports (SARs) filed by financial institutions, indicating scrutiny of her financial transactions by law enforcement.

persons.context: Sends email providing SARs and bank spreadsheets related to Ghislaine Maxwell to an unspecified recipient, facilitating the financial investigation.

events.title: FBI provides Maxwell SARs
events.description: An FBI forensic accountant emails Suspicious Activity Reports filed on Ghislaine Maxwell along with bank spreadsheets from UBS and JPMC to an unspecified recipient.

locations: FBI New York Field Office NYC, NY 10278
keyFacts: Suspicious Activity Reports (SARs) were filed on Ghislaine Maxwell by financial institutions.
The FBI forensic investigation included spreadsheets from UBS and JPMC banks attached to the SARs.
The communication occurred on June 18, 2020, indicating ongoing financial scrutiny of Maxwell around the time of her legal proceedings.
The document shows coordination between financial institutions and law enforcement in investigating Maxwell's activities.
